title: Govt allocates Rs 650.384 mln for next phase of Lahore Hajj Complex under PSDP 2025–26
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 10 (APP): The federal government has allocated Rs 650.384 million under the Public Sector Development Programme (PSDP) for fiscal year 2025–26 to advance the ongoing development of the Hajj Complex in Lahore.
According to the budget document released on Tuesday, this funding, earmarked for a continuance project of the Ministry of Religious Affairs and Interfaith Harmony, will support the next stage of construction at the Lahore complex enhancing infrastructure and operational capacity for improving the pilgrimage experience.
Furthermore, the upgraded facilities will “ensure smooth conduct of official business and provide maximum ease and comfort to pilgrims.”
